name: Rate Your Landlord
desc:
This application is here to create transparency in the rental and landlord market. 
 - Users are able to view, add, update, delete listings. 
 Tenants are able to create a review, and add a rating and have the system automatically calculate an average rating.
frontTech: Front End: React Javascript Html, SaSS, React Star Rating and Google Maps Api
backTech: Back End: NodeJS, Express, and Multer

name: Web Piano App
desc: This is a web piano for those who want to practice piano every day with out a real piano.

name: BrainFlix
desc: This is a Prototype Video Sharing Web Application.
frontTech: Front End: React Javascript Html, SaSS
